title: FaceTime Launching on Apple TV With iPhone and iPad Camera Integration
content:
Apple today announced that FaceTime is launching on Apple TV as part of tvOS 17. The feature will take advantage of Apple's Continuity Camera feature, allowing for people to use a wirelessly connected iPhone or iPad camera to join in a video call.
